content.heroIntro:
Welcome to Villa Aurea, an architectural masterpiece that redefines luxury living on the Costa Blanca. This exclusive contemporary villa sits majestically in the prestigious Cap Martí - El Tossalet - Pinomar area of Jávea, offering an unparalleled blend of modern sophistication and Mediterranean charm. With breathtaking panoramic views stretching across the azure coastline and surrounding countryside, this exceptional property represents the pinnacle of Costa Blanca real estate.

Designed by renowned developer Miralbo Urbana, Villa Aurea combines cutting-edge contemporary architecture with the timeless appeal of Mediterranean living. Every detail has been meticulously crafted to create a sanctuary of luxury, from the stunning infinity pool that appears to merge with the horizon to the thoughtfully designed interior spaces that maximise both comfort and style. This turnkey villa offers immediate enjoyment for discerning buyers seeking the ultimate Costa Blanca lifestyle.

locationSection.intro:
The Cap Martí - El Tossalet - Pinomar district represents one of Jávea's most coveted residential areas, combining exclusivity with exceptional convenience. This elevated location provides residents with stunning panoramic views while maintaining easy access to all of Jávea's amenities, from the world-famous Arenal beach to the charming historic town center. The area is renowned for its tranquil atmosphere, premium properties, and strong sense of community among international residents.

Jávea itself stands as the jewel of the Costa Blanca, offering a perfect balance of natural beauty, cultural richness, and modern amenities. The town boasts three distinct coastal areas - the historic port, the golden sands of Arenal beach, and the dramatic cliffs of Cap de la Nau - each offering unique attractions and lifestyle opportunities. With year-round sunshine, excellent infrastructure, and a thriving international community, Jávea continues to attract discerning buyers from across Europe seeking their ideal Mediterranean retreat.
highlights: Minutes from the iconic Arenal beach with golden sands and crystal-clear waters
Walking distance to international schools including Lady Elizabeth School
Close proximity to premium supermarkets, restaurants, and cafes
Easy access to Jávea's historic port and charming old town
Excellent transport links to Valencia (1.5 hours) and Alicante airports

propertyFeatures.intro: Villa Aurea showcases contemporary design excellence across every detail, from the premium BOSCH kitchen appliances to the elegant en-suite bedrooms. Built to Miralbo Urbana's exacting standards, this turnkey property combines luxury finishes with practical functionality, ensuring an effortless transition to Mediterranean living.
features: 4 spacious en-suite bedrooms designed for maximum comfort and privacy
Designer kitchen with premium BOSCH appliances and modern finishes
Bright, open-plan living area with direct terrace access
Spectacular infinity pool with panoramic views
Professionally landscaped Mediterranean gardens on 1,000m² plot
Large garage accommodating two vehicles with additional storage
Contemporary architectural design with clean lines and premium materials
Turnkey delivery with all furnishings and equipment included
Energy-efficient construction with modern insulation and climate control
Multiple outdoor terraces and entertaining areas

content.investmentSection:
Villa Aurea represents an exceptional investment opportunity in one of Spain's most sought-after coastal destinations. Jávea's property market has demonstrated remarkable resilience and growth, driven by consistent international demand and limited premium inventory. The combination of stunning location, contemporary design, and turnkey delivery makes this property particularly attractive to both lifestyle buyers and investment-focused purchasers seeking premium rental returns in the luxury market segment.

The Costa Blanca continues to attract significant investment interest from Northern European buyers seeking safe-haven assets in established markets. Villa Aurea's prime location, quality construction, and immediate rental potential position it perfectly to benefit from this ongoing demand. With Spain's Golden Visa program and favorable tax arrangements for non-residents, this property offers both lifestyle benefits and solid long-term investment fundamentals in one of Europe's most desirable residential markets.
whyBuySection: Turnkey luxury villa ready for immediate enjoyment with premium furnishings included
Prime location in exclusive Jávea area with panoramic views and beach proximity
Contemporary design by respected developer Miralbo Urbana with quality guarantee
Strong rental investment potential in high-demand luxury market segment
Comprehensive amenities including infinity pool, landscaped gardens, and double garage
Excellent transport links to major airports and Spanish cities
Established international community with premium schools and healthcare nearby

faqs.question: What is the total price and what payment options are available?
faqs.answer: Villa Aurea is priced at €1,550,000. We offer flexible payment plans and can connect you with mortgage specialists through our Habeno partnership for competitive financing options.

faqs.question: Where exactly is the villa located and what are the surroundings like?
faqs.answer: The villa is located in the prestigious Cap Martí - El Tossalet - Pinomar area of Jávea, offering panoramic views and tranquil surroundings while being just minutes from Arenal beach, international schools, and premium amenities.

faqs.question: What is included in the turnkey delivery?
faqs.answer: Villa Aurea comes fully furnished and equipped, including premium BOSCH kitchen appliances, furniture, landscaped gardens, infinity pool, and all fixtures. You can move in immediately without any additional investment.

faqs.question: When will the villa be completed and ready for occupation?
faqs.answer: Please contact us at +34 634 044 970 for current completion timeline and availability. Miralbo Urbana maintains strict quality standards and delivery schedules for all projects.

faqs.question: Can I obtain a mortgage for this property as a non-Spanish resident?
faqs.answer: Yes, non-residents can typically obtain mortgages for up to 70% of the property value. Visit our Habeno mortgage link for pre-qualification and competitive rates from Spanish banks.

faqs.question: What is the rental potential for this villa?
faqs.answer: Jávea's luxury rental market is very strong, particularly for premium properties near Arenal beach. Similar villas achieve excellent seasonal rates, with annual yields of 5-7% being typical for well-managed properties.

faqs.question: How can I arrange a viewing of Villa Aurea?
faqs.answer: Contact us via WhatsApp or call +34 634 044 970 to arrange your private viewing. We can also provide virtual tours and detailed floor plans for international buyers.

faqs.question: What are the ongoing costs for owning this villa?
faqs.answer: Annual costs include property tax (IBI), community fees (if applicable), utilities, insurance, and maintenance. We provide detailed cost breakdowns and can recommend local property management services.

faqs.question: Is this suitable as a permanent residence?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Villa Aurea is designed for year-round living with modern amenities, proximity to international schools, healthcare facilities, and all necessary services for permanent residents.

content.conclusion: Villa Aurea represents a rare opportunity to acquire a turnkey luxury villa in one of Jávea's most prestigious locations. With its contemporary design, panoramic views, and immediate availability, this exceptional property offers the perfect gateway to Mediterranean luxury living. Contact us today at +34 634 044 970 or via WhatsApp to arrange your private viewing and discover why Villa Aurea could be your ideal Costa Blanca home.
